subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Rays agreed on a minor league contract with the right-hander Juan Carlos Oviedo, who played under the fake name Leo Nunez before an eight-week suspension by Major League Baseball last year.
snippet: The Rays agreed on a minor league contract with the right-hander Juan Carlos Oviedo, who played under the fake name Leo Nunez before an eight-week suspension by Major League Baseball last year.
